humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The oracle bone inscriptions fight against each other with palms, and have the shape of anger and crown. The original meaning is that the two fight each other.

"Shuowen": "Fighting, two soldiers facing each other, with a stick behind, like a fight. All those who fight are in the fight." Luo Zhenyu: "The characters of the inscriptions are like two people fighting each other without a stick." In addition, " dou " can also be written as "é¬¬", and modern simplified characters use the homophone of " dou " to mean " dou ".

" Dou " in the oracle bone inscriptions is suspected to be used as the original meaning of fighting, see "Collection" 4726. In addition, " Dou " is often pronounced as " Xi " and is used as a place name. " Complete Collection" 152 is: "Zhen Yu Dou (Xi)", referring to me fetching grass in the land. "Compilation" 8132: "Cai (in) Dou (éƒ–)." "Shu Wen": "Xi, Hongnong County Yudi. Congyi, Dousheng."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle fights against each other with palms, and has the shape of anger and crown. The original meaning is that the two fight each other.

Fight
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[â‘ ]ï¼»dÃ²uï¼½
["Guangyun" cuts all beans, waits, and ends. ]
Also called "îš¢1". Also called "îš¥1". Traditional characters for "æ–—3". Also known as "é—˜1". Also known as "é¬¦1". Also known as "é¬ª1". Also known as "é¬­1". Also called "î‘²1".
(1) Fight; fight.
(2) Competition; competition for victory.
(3) In ancient times, it was said that stars collided with each other.
(4) Chaos.
(5) Take advantage of it.
(6) Facing; relative.
(7) Encounter, meet together.
(8) Put together and make up.
(9) The fine products of tea.
(10) Dialects. Bird's nest.
(11) Through "come". Tease; tease.
(12) Through "pocket". Solicit. See "Buy in a bucket".
(13) Through "steep". adverb. suddenly.
(14) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was Bobby Chu. See "GuangyunÂ·Quhou".
